long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: this extension allows you to upload a zip file then it compresses all your code from all your files into a string(as few tokens as possible) to add into an ai prompt. If you have ever started developing a plugin and it gets to be a few files deep, it becomes a real issue if you want to provide the full code to an ai for context. This plugin helps you send it all in one single string of text using as few tokens as possible!
